components.description:
A fluffy, white cloud, as a cumulus. May be used as a weather icon to represent a cloudy or overcast day.

Twitter’s design features two clouds. Google’s cloud was previously bluish.
components.title: Cloud

description:
A fluffy, white cloud, as a cumulus. May be used as a weather icon to represent a cloudy or overcast day.

Twitter’s design features two clouds. Google’s cloud was previously bluish.
title: Cloud

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols -> Weather and astrological symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A cumulus cloud, which shows on some systems as a silhouette in black, and on other systems as a shaded white cloud. Used in weather forecas http://emojipedia.org/cloud/
emoji_net_data.name: cloud

bn:00083292v: To overspread or hide with a cloud or clouds.
To hide, put out of sight.
To hide, put out of sight etc.

bn:00072016n: The Sky is the portion of outer space or the atmosphere visible from a position within a world.
Everything that is above the surface of the Earth.
The atmosphere above a given point, especially as visible from the ground during the day.
The sky is everything that lies above the surface of the Earth, including the atmosphere and outer space.
The atmosphere and outer space as viewed from the earth
The part of the earth's atmosphere and space outside it that is visible from earth's surface. During the day it is perceived as blue, and at night as black.

bn:00020002n: Suspensions of minute water droplets or ice crystals produced by the condensation of water vapour.
In meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
Visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals suspended in the atmosphere
A visible mass of water droplets suspended in the air.
Visible mass of water droplets suspended in the air.
A visible mass of water or ice particles suspended at a considerable altitude
Clouds are visible masses of water droplets or frozen ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of the Earth or another planetary body.

bn:00006808n: The atmospheric conditions that comprise the state of the atmosphere in terms of temperature and wind and clouds and precipitation
The day-to-day meteorological conditions, especially temperature, cloudiness, and rainfall, affecting a specific place.
Unpleasant or destructive atmospheric conditions, and their effects.
Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree that it is hot or cold, wet or dry, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
